All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Account
This class contains all the information related to an account created by the user.
AccountConcrete
Concrete class account.
AccountFilter
This class contains Stream methods to filter a Collection of Account
AccountFilter.Filters
Types of filters
AccountRemoverListener
Concrete Command (Command Pattern) provided by Java Swing Architecture.
AccountSelectCurrentListener
Concrete Command (Command Pattern) provided by Java Swing Architecture.
Animate
This type of objects implements an operation to increase Decorator's footage
Animations
A set of Animate classes to increase all Decorator's game footage.
Arches
This class is composed by methods and pictures that concur to represent the external non-playable borders for game-panel.
Arches.Arch
Arches is formed by each Arch combination.
ArchesCity
The Arches with render specific format for City Stage context.
ArchesClassical
The Arches with render specific format for Classical Stage context.
ArchesJungle
The Arches with render specific format for Jungle Stage context.
AvatarAccount
Account Avatar.
AvatarAccountSelectorButton
A JButton with encapsulated AvatarAccount in it.
AvatarAccountSelectorInCreationNested
The nested panel into DynaSlaveAccountCreationNested in which all choosable AvatarAccount are showed.
AvatarHeroItem
This class represents a choosable player character in DynaSlavePlayer and DynaSlavePlayerNested panels.
AvatarJListManagerOfSelections
Personalized Listener of the DynaSlavePlayerNested JList Selection Model.
AvatarJListModel
Personalized model for the JList used in DynaSlavePlayerNested.
AvatarJListRenderer
Personalized CellRenderer for the JList used in DynaSlavePlayerNested.
AvatarUser
User's Avatar in game.
Bomb
Class of objects thought to be the bombs of the game.
Bomb.Type
Type of implemented bombs
BombFaster
Particular bomb with fewer pre-explosion phases.
BombRemote
special bomb whose explosion is determined by the player's input and not by the transitory phases.
BombStandard
Standard bomb model.
Boss
This interface is a label that is implemented by entities that are considered end-of-stage bosses.
ButtonGameMouseListener
Concrete Command (Command Pattern) provided by Java Swing Architecture.
ButtonMenuMouseListener
Concrete Command (Command Pattern) provided by Java Swing Architecture.
CartesianCoordinate
This class models a Cartesian point
ColorTwister
This class encapsulates color manipulation algorithms.
DecoratedAccount
It's an Account (from Model) in which is wrapped an AvatarAccount (to represent it in the View) and a Color.
DecoratedBomb
Decorated Bomb for BombStandard and BombFast
DecoratedBombRemote
Decorated Bomb only for BombRemote
DecoratedEnemyBoss
Decorated version of an EnemyBoss
DecoratedFire
Decorated Prop version of a Fire from Model
DecoratedGravediggerByNpc
Decorated Gravedigger related to a death NPC event.
DecoratedGravediggerScore
Decorated Gravedigger related to a score acquisition by the player event.
DecoratedLevel
Decorated version of a Level in which view elements are wrapped.
DecoratedMrPyroWhiteBlue
Special DecoratedNonPlayableCharacter version for MrPyroWhiteBlue.
DecoratedNonPlayableCharacter
This class is a second level of abstraction to decorate an NPC component in a more specific way.
DecoratedNonPlayableCharacterWithDeathImage
This class is a third decoration step for Decorated Object in which death image is predefined
DecoratedNpcDuo
This class is a forth decoration step for a Decorated Object that is represented in two possible direction of movement during its animations.
DecoratedNpcDuoRunner
This class is a DecoratedNpcDuo class with Runner type.
DecoratedNpcMono
This class is a third decoration step for a Decorated Object that is represented in only one direction of movement during its animations.
DecoratedNpcTetra
This class is a third level of abstraction to decorate an NPC component in a more specific way.
DecoratedObstacle
DecoratorProp for an Obstacle type object
DecoratedPlayerCharacter
This class gives its supertype the footages array and lists and also the way to process these animations.
DecoratedPowerUp
Decorated version of a Prop object implementing Powerupper interface
DecoratedTessera
Decorated version of a Tessera object
DecoratedWall
Decorated version of a Wall object
DecoratorAccount
Decorator Pattern to decorate an Account from Model.
DecoratorBomb
Decorated version of a Bomb object
DecoratorGravedigger
Gravedigger Decoration permits to add special effects to a Gravedigger related event.
DecoratorLevel
Decorated version of a Level object
DecoratorNonPlayableCharacter
This class is a first decorative shell of an NPC component in the way of Decorator Design Pattern.
DecoratorPlayerCharacter
Decorated version of a PlayerCharacter to implement its View animations in a Decorator Design Patter way.
DecoratorProp
Decorated version of a Prop to implement its View animations in a Decorator Design Patter way.
DecoratorTessera
Decorated version of a TesseraAbstract to implement its View animations in a Decorator Design Patter way.
Dir
Pre-established set of directions that give dimensionality to the entities that live in this application.
DropBombFaster
Bomb release behavior designed to release faster bombs
DropBombRemote
Bomb release behavior designed to release remote bombs
DropBombStandard
Bomb release behavior designed to release standard bombs
DynaFrame
This is the personalized JFrame of the application in which the View manifests.
DynaJPanelAccountNested
Personalized JPanel intended to be nested into a DynaSlaveCard JPanel
DynaManager
The DynaManager has the main role of holding the objects that represent the levels, managing their loading and selection necessary for their effective use.
DynaMasterCard
This Class is the Game Model' Observer during running ThreadMenu and it is the Master of its CardLayout: the Layout that manages JPanels of the application.
DynaSlaveAccount
The Card shows current account data and can direct to account panels with advanced operations.
DynaSlaveAccountCreation
The Card implements GUI to create a new Account.
DynaSlaveAccountCreationNested
The nested JPanel receives input by User to create a new Decorated Account
DynaSlaveAccountNested
The nested JPanel to show current Account data.
DynaSlaveAccountsManager
The Card shows all accounts and proposes saving and loading file operations.
DynaSlaveAccountsManagerNested
The nested panel in which the table of all accounts is shown.
DynaSlaveAccountsStats
The Card shows accounts table filtered by User selected statistic operation.
DynaSlaveAccountsStatsNested
The nested panel in which filtered accounts table is shown.
DynaSlaveCard
This class defines the abstraction common to all card panels in the Master's CardLayout.
DynaSlaveGame
This Class is the Game Model' Observer during running ThreadGame.
DynaSlaveOption
The Card in which is possible to change game settings.
DynaSlavePlayer
The Card in which the User can select the Player Character for the game session.
DynaSlavePlayerNested
The nested panel that encapsulates a GridBagLayout to show choosable player Characters.
DynaSlaveStage
The Card in which User can choose the Stage to play.
DynaSlaveStageNested
This panel shows selected stage and permits to change it.
DynaSlaveStart
This Card is the first shown by this Application.
DynaSound
This class is used to play the video game's music (songs) and its sound effects.
Enemy
An NPC with hostility true against the player character.
EnemyBombEater
An enemy that eats bombs it can find in the direction it is moving.
EnemyBoss
A special enemy whose defeat allows you to complete the stage
EnemyBossClown
A concrete EnemyBoss object
EnemyBossSergeant
A concrete EnemyBoss object
EnemyBossUfoBrain
A concrete EnemyBoss object.
EnemyPyro
This enemy represents a special effects that damage the player character as an enemy when collides with him.
EnemyRunner
An enemy that can fly without limits in the game grid.
EnemyShooter
An enemy that can shoots EnemyPyro in casual direction.
EnemyUnstoppable
An unstoppable enemy doesn't use visitor mover for moving so it isn't affect by solidity collisions
EnjoyNpcMediator
Implemented version of NpcMediator from Model in which view components are developed.
EnjoyPowerUpMediator
Implemented version of PowerUpMediator from Model in which view components are developed.
Entity
Class that establishes the basis of any object that directly or indirectly determines the fate of a game scene.
FactoryDecoratedLevel
This factory contains all the information, references and methods needed to create any level in this game.
FactoryDecoratedNPC
This factory contains all the information and methods needed to create non playable character set for any level of the game.
FactoryDecoratedPlayerCharacter
This factory contains all the information and methods needed to create any playable character of this game.
FactoryDecoratedPowerUp
This factory releases decorated version of power-ups.
FactoryTesterAvatarUser
Factory for tester accounts creation.
Figure
Figure is an entity that exists within the game grid, it occupies a specific space entirely and does not move.
FileFilterJBomberMan
Thi is the personalized FileFilter I use in the DynaSlaveAccountManager to accept, into the JFileChooser, only file with ".jbm" extension.
Fire
The only Prop that have lethality true.
Fire.FlameSpread
Types of fires: they can be the tip of an explosion or inside an arm
FootageDeath
FootageDeath type has methods to manage death animation.
FootageFuncs
FootageFuncs type has methods to manage its animation ( or footage ).
FootageWin
FootageWin type has methods to manage win animation.
GameCharacter
A Game Character is an entity that lives and moves in the game panel but in doing so interacts with the grid.
GameCharacter.Degree
The degrees represent the pairs of directions that identify the derived and plausible diagonal directions.
GameFirstOptionListener
Concrete Command (Command Pattern) provided by Java Swing Architecture.
GameModel
Game Model is the main actor of the application.
GameOptionListener
Abstraction implemented by Concrete Command (Command Pattern), provided by Java Swing Architecture.
GameSecondOptionListener
Concrete Command (Command Pattern) provided by Java Swing Architecture.
GameState
Class for State Design Pattern
Gravedigger
Class that carries information from a newly destroyed non-player character or collected power Up to notify the Game Model of the score to be added to the current score value.
Heroes
Set of predefined heroes playable in this video game
HeroesDescriptions
Description container to use for selecting characters in the DynaSlavePlayerNested.
Hound
Interface implemented by the entities chasing the main character
InconsistenArrayException
Home-made exception for manage array desiderable length
InconsistentCoordinateException
Home-made exception to manage insertion of inconsistent grid coordinates
JBomberMan
Main method class
KeyListenerGame
Personalized version of a KeyListener to manage inputs reception during a game session (running ThreadGame).
KeyListenerMenu
Personalized version of a KeyListener to manage inputs reception during menu' (running ThreadMenu).
Lethal
Interface implemented by Figure that can have lethality true
LevelAbstract
Abstract class used to manage every level subtype.
LevelConcrete
Class that define what is a level in this game
LevelConcrete.LevelBuilder
Builder Pattern to help level construction
ModelPointer
Class models a pointer, as a cursor pointer
ModelTimer
Class models a Timer counter
MyGridFormat
Interface with public static field of this videogame parameters grid
MyJBombermanFormat
Interface with public static field for these parameters: Game fluidity, Sprite standard dimensions, Game grid dimensions and derived values, PC's spawn coordinates.
NonPlayableCharacter
This class models non-player characters.
NonPlayableCharacter.Behavior
Possible behavioral states of the character
NpcMediator
Mediator that encapsulates dependencies of NPC in every game level.
NpcType
Types of npcs implemented in this version
Obstacle
These Prop are breakable and solid.
OptionExecuter
An OptionExecuter is an executor of options Commands and esc function Command
Order
This Class represents an Order object from the Observable Model to all its Observers.
Order.Label
Possible labels to choose
PlayerCharacter
Class models an instance of Player Character
PlayerCharacterConcrete
Instance of a concrete player character
PlayerCharacterConcrete.PlayerCharacterBuilder
Builder Design Pattern for PlayerCharacterConcrete
PowerUp
Power Up class.
PowerUp.Power
Types of powerup implemented
PowerUpMediator
PowerUp are regulated by their mediator.
PowerUpMediator.Message
Messages can be send to the mediator
Powerupper
Interface implemented by concrete powerup
Prop
They are the objects use to be bundle to Tesserae.
PropWrapper
This interface permits to locate Prop referral to the implementation
ReleaseBehavior
Interface for the Strategy Pattern that defines the bomb release behaviors of the player characters
RelocateSpecialComponents
A card with other components besides invisible buttons which must be relocated
Runner
This interface is recognized by the visitor as a polymorphism of his visit method.
StateAbstract
This abstraction holds the instances of its sub-types and it supplies them with some utility methods.
StateContinue
This state is connected by design in these ways: (1) from StatePlaying to this if StatePlaying's gameContinue = true; (2) from this to StateStarter with GFLO (GameFirstOptionListener); (3) from this to StateGameOver with GSLO (GameSecondOptionListener).
StateGameOver
This state is connected by design in these ways: (1) from StatePlaying to this if StatePlaying's gameOver = true; (2) from StateContinue to this with GSLO (GameSecondOptionListener); (3) from StatePaused to this with GSLO (GameSecondOptionListener); (4) from this to ThreadGame's ender with gameOver=true (ThreadGame's death).
StateLabel
Labels for the states of Game.
StatePanel
Abstraction of View Game State used for DynaSlaveGame states.
StatePanelContinue
It's the state of the View when the player has lost an attempt but can decide to try another game session without game over.
StatePanelGameOver
It's the state of the view when a game over occurs.
StatePanelGameWin
It's the state of the view when a game level win occurs.
StatePanelLoading
It's the first state of the view when Controller and Model aren't ready yet.
StatePanelOptionable
Abstraction for states that display options on the screen that can be chosen by the user.
StatePanelPaused
It's the state of the view when the game is paused by the user.
StatePanelPlaying
It's the state of the view in which a game session is in progress.
StatePanelStarter
It's the state of the view that introduces the player to the level he is about to begin.
StatePanelWinStage
It's the state of the view in which the player won the stage.
StatePaused
This state is connected by design in these ways: (1) from StatePlaying to this if StatePlaying's actualTG.isPaused = true; (2) from this to StatePlaying with GFLO (GameFirstOptionListener); (3) from this to StateGameOver with GSLO (GameSecondOptionListener).
StatePlaying
This state is connected by design in these ways: (1) from StateStarter to this at the end of StateStarter's count down; (2) from this to StatePaused if this' actualTG.isPaused = true; (3) from this to StateContinue if this' gameContinue = true; (4) from this to StateGameOver if this' gameOver = true; (5) from this to StateWinLevel if this' gameWin = true and there's another next level; (6) from this to StateWinStage if this' gameWin = true and there's not another next level.
StateStarter
This state is connected by design in these ways: (1) from initialization of a new ThreadGame to this; (2) from this to StatePlaying when this count-down is completed.
StateWinLevel
This state is connected by design in these ways: (1) from StatePlaying to this if StatePlaying's gameWin = true and there's another next level; (3) from this to StateStarter with GFLO automatically (GameFirstOptionListener).
StateWinStage
This state is connected by design in these ways: (1) from StatePlaying to this if StatePlaying's gameWin = true and there's not another next level; (3) from this to ThreadGame's ender with gameWin=true (ThreadGame's death).
TableModelAccounts
Personalized AbstractTableModel as model for JTable in the DynaSlaveAccountsManagerNested.
TableRefresher
View component that has a JTable and need to recalculate it because view updates.
TesseraAbstract
TesseraAbstract is the super type of each concrete Tessera.
TesseraConcrete
class of a concrete Tessera that can be instantiated.
Theater
Unequivocal label of a specific level inserted into a determined stage.
Theater.Scene
Scene indicates a specific level.
Theater.Stage
Stages are level sequences which are characterized by the very same play contexts.
ThreadDelta
Basic functionalities that a concrete ThreadGame must have.
ThreadGame
This class models the algorithms which create a game session.
ThreadMenu
The JBomberMan's Main method always start an instance of this class which will be the same in all life-cycle of the application.
TimerExplosion
Interface implemented by remote bombs that defines their particular methods
Visitor
Interface of a Visitor Design Pattern
VisitorAcceptor
Interface implemented by Visitor Acceptors to accept Visitor's visit.
VisitorCharactersMover
This Visitor encapsulates all the methods that determine Game Character movement.
Vocabulary
This class is used to convert String objects into images to be drawn in the view in order to obtain a coherent aesthetic in the video game
Wall
These Prop are unbreakable and solid.
